get.summary: Get all allocations per entry or report
get.description: Gets all allocations per entry or report.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of records to return. The default is 25 and the maximum is 100.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The starting point of the next set of results, after the limit specified in the limit field has been reached.

parameters.name: reportID
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the report as it appears in the Concur Expense UI. Format: A variable-length string. Maximum length: 32 characters.

parameters.name: entryID
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the expense entry.

parameters.name: itemizationID
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the expense itemization.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: The login ID of the user who owns the allocation. The user must have the Web Services Admin role to use this parameter.

get.summary: Get a single allocation by ID
get.description: Gets a single allocation by ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the allocation.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: The login ID of the user who owns the allocation. The user must have the Web Services Admin role to use this parameter.

NextPage.description: The value in the Org Unit or Custom field. For list fields, this is the name of the list item.  Maximum length: 48 characters

AccountCode1.description: The value in the Org Unit or Custom field. For list fields, this is the name of the list item.  Maximum length: 48 characters

AccountCode2.description: The value in the Org Unit or Custom field. For list fields, this is the name of the list item.  Maximum length: 48 characters

EntryID.description: The value in the Org Unit or Custom field. For list fields, this is the name of the list item.  Maximum length: 48 characters

ID.description: The value in the Org Unit or Custom field. For list fields, this is the name of the list item.  Maximum length: 48 characters

IsHidden.description: Indicates whether the percentage has been edited. Format: true or false

IsPercentEdited.description: Indicates whether the percentage has been edited. Format: true or false

Percentage.description: The value in the Org Unit or Custom field. For list fields, this is the name of the list item.  Maximum length: 48 characters

URI.description: The value in the Org Unit or Custom field. For list fields, this is the name of the list item.  Maximum length: 48 characters

Code.description: The value in the Org Unit or Custom field. For list fields, this is the name of the list item.  Maximum length: 48 characters

Label.description: The label value for the custom field.

ListItemID.description: The value in the Org Unit or Custom field. For list fields, this is the name of the list item.  Maximum length: 48 characters

Sequence.description: The sequence value for this custom field i.e. the order in which this field appears on the form.

Type.description: The value in the Org Unit or Custom field. For list fields, this is the name of the list item.  Maximum length: 48 characters

Value.description: The value in the Org Unit or Custom field. For list fields, this is the name of the list item.  Maximum length: 48 characters
